channel.title: 4 Questions
channel.description:
1.) [b]Preventing Setbacks-[/b] How can I prevent the server from being setback after every time I shut it off?
2.) [b]Run Server-[/b] There are two files that can run the server. One says "Memleak(fixed.)" and the other says "Run Server." Which one do I click to run, and what does "Memleak(fixed.)" stand for? [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/14tn4b7.jpg[/img]
3.) [b]Changing The Bank Title-[/b] How can I change the title of my bank to the name of my server? [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/4j3vwl.jpg[/img]
4.) [b]Unspawnable Areas-[/b] How can I make it so you're unable to spawn items in the wilderness and in the duel arena?

item.title: 4 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

[quote=“chazion, post:2, topic:422426”]1. Make it save everytime you shit it off…
2. exactly how it sounds.(use the Memleakfixed)
3. rsinterface client sided
4. if (c.inWild) { return; }[/quote]

What file do I put the code into?

What does memleak do?..

How can I make it so the server saves?

Read full topic

item.title: 4 Questions
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

  1. Make it save everytime you shit it off…
  2. exactly how it sounds.(use the Memleakfixed)
  3. rsinterface client sided
  4. if (c.inWild) { return; }

Read full topic
